titlebar.input: Enter text to be edited here.
titlebar.effects: Change the effect, which changes how your input will be edited.
titlebar.output: The outcome of your input in the current effect will be displayed here.

effects.lowercase: Lowers the case of all the text.
effects.uppercase: Raises the case of all the text.
effects.titlecase: Title cases text, which capitalizes the first letter of most words.
effects.htmllower: Loweres the case of HTML tags.
effects.htmlupper: Raises the case of HTML tags.
effects.find: Type text in the find box to highlight it with capital letters.
effects.replace: Type text in the find box to replace it with the text you type in the replace box.
effects.sortaz: Sorts a list in alphabetical order.
effects.sortza: Sorts a list in reverse alphabetical order.
effects.sortreverse: Sorts a list in reverse order.
effects.sortrandom: Sorts a list in a random order. Click again to reorder the list.
effects.list: Turns the input into a list.
effects.remove_list: Removes characters at the beginning of items in a list.
effects.repeat: Enter a number to repeat all the text that many times.
effects.wordcount: Counts the number of characters, words, and liens int he text.
effects.rot13: Uses ROT13 encryption on the text by shifting every letter 13 letters forward in the alphabet.

help.about: Read some information about Text Tools and grab a handy bookmarklet.
help.help: Read some helpful FAQs to get acquainted with Text Tools.
help.email: Email me any questions, comments, suggestions, or bug reports about this tool, with "Text Tools" in the subject of the email.
